trans-unit.source: Converts service, contract, and endpoint information into metadata documents.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class to transform <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects into metadata represented by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> is used in a three-step process.

Call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method, passing the appropriate parameters.
Determine whether there are any export errors by checking the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.

If there are no errors, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> to get a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects or get more specific versions of the metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> properties.

You can support exporting custom WSDL extensions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface and custom policy assertions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
For details, see the documentation for those interfaces.

The `WsdlExporter` can only be used to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances that contain Common Language Runtime (CLR) type information, such as a `ContractDescription` instance created using the `ContractDescription.GetContract` method or created as part of the `ServiceDescription` for a `ServiceHost` instance.
You cannot use the `WsdlExporter` to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances imported from service metadata or constructed without type information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> class.
Use to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object.
Exports metadata that describes only the contract information from the specified contract description.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> method to export metadata from only one contract.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription"></xref> to generate metadata from.
The exporter encountered an error.
The contract is `null`.
Generates metadata about the specified endpoint.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to create metadata about a single endpoint.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> about which to return metadata.
The exporter encountered an error.
endpoint is `null`.
The binding is `null`.
Generates metadata about a group of endpoints from a specified service.
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method to create metadata about a set of endpoints from a specified service.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint"></xref> objects about which to generate metadata.
The name of the service.
The exporter encountered an error.
wsdlServiceQName is `null`.
A binding is `null`.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects after calling one of the export methods.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> objects.
Gets a set of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> objects after calling one of the export methods.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
A set of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> objects.
Returns an enumerable collection of generated <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.

Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> property to get a collection of all the metadata generated as a result of any number of calls to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
It is recommended that you check the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether any errors occurred before you retrieve the metadata.

An enumerable collection of generated <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata generated as a result of calls to <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription)"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)"></xref>, or <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)"></xref>.
